data.message: Please stop trying to please the health nuts, they shouldn't be drinking fizzy drinks if they're taking their health as seriously as they think they are. Replacing sugars with sweeteners is actually worse off for us, not to mention flavour enhancers. Just put Cherry Coke into some glass bottles and make them 2Leter bottles, you would make more money and see that people -adore- Cherry Coke the way it is, without HealthNuts trying to ruin it ♥
